directions: Combine black-eyed peas, green bell pepper, celery, red onion, and yellow onion in a large bowl.
Whisk vegetable oil, sugar, cider vinegar, garlic, salt, black pepper, and hot pepper sauce together in a bowl.
Pour vinegar mixture over vegetables; toss to coat. Cover and refrigerate overnight before serving.
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups canned black-eyed peas, rinsed and drained
title: Melissa's Black-Eyed Pea Salad
